name: Winter Party Starter
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration.Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.

1 Charge.
Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes, temporarily blinding and deafening nearby Players.

name: Third Year Party Starter
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration.Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate our three years together.

1 Charge.
Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes, temporarily blinding and deafening nearby Players.
""Happy Anniversary! Here is to our three years together!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

name: Flashlight
description:
A standard Flashlight.Can be used to light your way in the darkness.
8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
"Most of the battery life was wastefully used by the previous owner."

name: Sport Flashlight
description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip.Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
Increased Aim accuracy of +20 %.
Decreased Battery Depletion rate of -11 %.

name: Utility Flashlight
description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
12 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 12 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
Increased Beam brightness of +30 %.
Increased Blindness duration of +15 %.
Reduced Aim accuracy of -20 %.

name: Will O' Wisp
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Flashlight equipped with a special lens cover that adds an orange tint and a little Ghost to the beam.

8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
More friendly Ghosts in your life.
"Happy Trick or Treating!"

name: Anniversary Flashlight
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Flashlight.

8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
Explodes with confetti upon blinding the Killer.Surprise!
""Happy Anniversary! Here is to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

name: Masquerade Flashlight
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
Not even a mask can protect you from this Flashlight's bright beam.

8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
""Happy Anniversary! The future looks bright!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

name: Broken Key
description:
The bow and shank of a key, vibrating with remnant power.The Broken Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.
Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Broken Key's power into various effects.
Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 10 seconds.

Activates the Broken Key's Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.

name: Dull Key
description:
A bent and dull Key that once held great power.The Dull Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.
Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Dull Key's power into various effects.
Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 5 seconds.

Activates the Dull Key's Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.
The  Dull Key can be consumed to open the Hatch, if it has not been depleted of its Charges.

name: Skeleton Key
description:
A tarnished and crooked Key, vibrating with ominous power.The Skeleton Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.
Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Skeleton Key's power into various effects.
Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 30 seconds.

Activates the Skeleton Key's  Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.
The  Skeleton Key can be consumed to open the Hatch, if it has not been depleted of its Charges.

name: Map
description:
An old piece of parchment made out of a skin-like material that is rolled and sealed with an uncoloured leather string.
Holding and channelling the Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.

Start the Trial with 1 Generator tracked.
The Map tracks any of the following objects:

Generators within 8 metres.
Generators, Chest, and Totem revealed by Detective's Hunch.
The Map lasts for 20 seconds.

name: Rainbow Map
description:
An piece of parchment made out of oddly fresh skin with blood on its edge that has yet to dry, and that is rolled and sealed with multiple coloured ropes and cords.
Holding and channelling the Rainbow Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.

Start the Trial with 3 random objects tracked.
The Rainbow Map tracks any of the following objects:

Exit Gate Switches, Generators, and the Hatch when you come within 8 metres.
Various Killer Belongings when you come within 8 metres.
Generators, Chests, and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch.
The Rainbow Map lasts for 20 seconds.
"It disheartens me. All this unspeakable knowledge and gruelling effort and yet nothing tangible, nothing usable to get out of this nightmare." — Vigo's Journal

name: Camping Aid Kit
description:
A rudimentary First Aid Kit which can save lives in emergencies, even if it's lacking some of its supplies.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +35 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Camping Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Barely has enough material for a decent patch-up."

name: First Aid Kit
description:
A standard First Aid Kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The First Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

name: Emergency Med-Kit
description:
A sturdy and well organised Med-Kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +45 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Emergency Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"There is a cure for almost everything...but not for this."

name: Ranger Med-Kit
description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed at emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +50 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Ranger Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween Stickers that has been packed with First-Aid equipment.

Makes you considerably more visible.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

name: Anniversary Med-Kit
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Med-Kit that explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!

Increased confetti of +100 %.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Anniversary Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Masquerade Med-Kit
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Med-Kit with a shocking surprise, giving a whole new meaning to the term "Health Scare".

Increased confetti of +100 %.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Masquerade Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! To your health!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Worn-Out Tools
description:
A metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Reduced Good Skill Check Success zone of -10 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Worn-Out Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.
"You call these tools? ... Really?"

name: Toolbox
description:
A metal box containing a set of basic tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +10 %.
The Toolbox has a Capacity of 20 Charges.
"It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

name: Mechanic's Toolbox
description:
A metal box with specialised mechanics tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +75 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -10 %.
The Mechanic's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.

name: Commodious Toolbox
description:
A large metal box containing basic tool and extra mechanical parts.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed by +50 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Commodious Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

name: Engineer's Toolbox
description:
A metal box with highly specialised tools meant for engineering.Most of the tools can be used by neophytes to make quick repairs or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +100 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -25 %.
The Engineer's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.
"I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralysed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." — Vigo's Journal

name: Alex's Toolbox
description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools.Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +10 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +50 %.
Alex's Toolbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

name: Anniversary Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox that is slightly explosive.

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Detonates a firework once depleted.Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Anniversary Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.
"Nothing says happy anniversary like detonating a firework and praying the Killer does not notice.Good luck and thank you for celebrating with us!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Festive Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox packed to the brim with fireworks, it is prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Succeeding a Great Skill Check detonates a small cluster of firecrackers.
Missing a Skill Check detonates fireworks.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Festive Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

name: Masquerade Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox with all of the standard gadgets: wrenches, screwdrivers, fireworks, a hammer...

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Detonates a firework once depleted.Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Masquerade Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! We're fixin' to have a big party!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: EMP
description:
Limited Item.
An electromagnetic pulse device that takes 100 seconds to be printed in Supply Cases.

Has 1 Token and takes 2.5 seconds to charge.
Slows your Movement speed while charging by -10 %.
Removes Temporal Slipstream from yourself and nearby Survivors.
Other Slipstreamed Survivors are highlighted to you in yellow when they are inside the Area of Effect of your charged EMP.
Disables any nearby Biopods for 45 seconds.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: First Aid Spray
description:
Limited Item.
A medication that helps reverse the effects of an Uroboros infection.

2 Tokens.
Cures Uroboros Infection.
Can be found in Supply Cases.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Flash Grenade
description:
Craft-able Limited Item.
Craft-able when using Flashbang.Can be used as a distraction or blinding device.

1 Token.
Detonates with a loud bang and flashing lights, temporarily blinding and deafening any nearby Players.
Creates a Loud Noise Notification at its Detonation location.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Keycard
description:
Limited Item.
A keycard exclusive to the Nostromo Wreckage Map.Can be retrieved from the body of a dead cosmonaut, which spawns in a random location on the Map.

Insert the Keycard into a terminal in the left wing of the Nostromo to unlock the Hack Terminal interaction:
Input the keybinds for Left, Down, Up, Right in this order.
Successfully inputting the keybinds opens an airlock door to a secret room containing a Chest.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Lament Configuration
description:
Limited Item.
Spawns in the environment when facing The Cenobite:

Initiates Chain Hunts after an initial idle phase.
Immediately initiates a Chain Hunt if The Cenobite interacts with it.
Reveals its Aura to all Survivors.
Survivors can pick up and carry the Lament Configuration to solve it:

Causes the Oblivious Status Effect while carried.
Reveals the Survivor's location to The Cenobite when starting to solve it, allowing him to teleport near them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Pocket Mirror
description:
Limited Item.
A pocket mirror pulled from the Basement's White Glyph.
Its surface is frosty.

Escaping with the Pocket Mirror awards a bonus of 25,000 Bloodpoints.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Remote Flame Turret
description:
Limited Item.
A flamethrower turret that can be retrieved from Control Stations and placed down by Survivors.

While carrying the Remote Flame Turret, the following effects apply:
Tracks the presence of The Xenomorph, beeping whenever it is within 41 metres of the Turret.
Grants immunity from being detected by The Xenomorph when it is roaming down in the tunnels.
Inflicts a -35 % Hindered Status Effect, as well as the Exhausted and Incapacitated Status Effects.
Reveals your Aura to all other Survivors.

After deploying the Remote Flame Turret, the following effects apply:
Still tracks the presence of The Xenomorph, beeping whenever it is within 41 metres of the Turret.
Shoots flames at The Xenomorph whenever it comes within 10 metres of the Turret and is in Line of Sight.
Flames slow The Xenomorph and can knock it out of its Crawler Mode.
The Turret overheats after firing for 4 seconds or after knocking The Xenomorph out of its Crawler Mode.
Overheated Turrets can be repaired by Survivors.
Multiple Turrets firing simultaneously do not stack their damage output.
The Xenomorph can destroy Remote Flame Turrets by attacking them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Vaccine
description:
Limited Item.
A vaccine that helps reverse the effects of a T-Virus infection.

1 Token.
Cures T-Virus Contamination.
Can be found in Supply Cases.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: VHS Tape
description:
Limited Item.
Can be retrieved from a TV and inserted back into a different one:

Increases Condemned by +2 Stacks when hit by the The Onryō while carrying the Cursed Tape.
Reduces Condemned by -3 Stacks when inserting the Cursed Tape into a random TV, which spreads The Onryō's message and temporarily turns the TV off.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Trapple
description:
THIS ITEM IS UNUSED
The use of this Item is unknown.

name: Sport Flashlight
description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip.Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
Increased Aim accuracy of +20 %.
Decreased Battery Depletion rate of -11 %.

description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
12 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 12 seconds.
Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
Increased Beam brightness of +30 %.
Increased Blindness duration of +15 %.
Reduced Aim accuracy of -20 %.

description:
Limited Item.
A medication that helps reverse the effects of an Uroboros infection.

2 Tokens.
Cures Uroboros Infection.
Can be found in Supply Cases.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Flash Grenade
description:
Craft-able Limited Item.
Craft-able when using Flashbang.Can be used as a distraction or blinding device.

1 Token.
Detonates with a loud bang and flashing lights, temporarily blinding and deafening any nearby Players.
Creates a Loud Noise Notification at its Detonation location.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Keycard
description:
Limited Item.
A keycard exclusive to the Nostromo Wreckage Map.Can be retrieved from the body of a dead cosmonaut, which spawns in a random location on the Map.

Insert the Keycard into a terminal in the left wing of the Nostromo to unlock the Hack Terminal interaction:
Input the keybinds for Left, Down, Up, Right in this order.
Successfully inputting the keybinds opens an airlock door to a secret room containing a Chest.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Lament Configuration
description:
Limited Item.
Spawns in the environment when facing The Cenobite:

Initiates Chain Hunts after an initial idle phase.
Immediately initiates a Chain Hunt if The Cenobite interacts with it.
Reveals its Aura to all Survivors.
Survivors can pick up and carry the Lament Configuration to solve it:

Causes the Oblivious Status Effect while carried.
Reveals the Survivor's location to The Cenobite when starting to solve it, allowing him to teleport near them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Pocket Mirror
description:
Limited Item.
A pocket mirror pulled from the Basement's White Glyph.
Its surface is frosty.

Escaping with the Pocket Mirror awards a bonus of 25,000 Bloodpoints.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Remote Flame Turret
description:
Limited Item.
A flamethrower turret that can be retrieved from Control Stations and placed down by Survivors.

While carrying the Remote Flame Turret, the following effects apply:
Tracks the presence of The Xenomorph, beeping whenever it is within 41 metres of the Turret.
Grants immunity from being detected by The Xenomorph when it is roaming down in the tunnels.
Inflicts a -35 % Hindered Status Effect, as well as the Exhausted and Incapacitated Status Effects.
Reveals your Aura to all other Survivors.

After deploying the Remote Flame Turret, the following effects apply:
Still tracks the presence of The Xenomorph, beeping whenever it is within 41 metres of the Turret.
Shoots flames at The Xenomorph whenever it comes within 10 metres of the Turret and is in Line of Sight.
Flames slow The Xenomorph and can knock it out of its Crawler Mode.
The Turret overheats after firing for 4 seconds or after knocking The Xenomorph out of its Crawler Mode.
Overheated Turrets can be repaired by Survivors.
Multiple Turrets firing simultaneously do not stack their damage output.
The Xenomorph can destroy Remote Flame Turrets by attacking them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Vaccine
description:
Limited Item.
A vaccine that helps reverse the effects of a T-Virus infection.

1 Token.
Cures T-Virus Contamination.
Can be found in Supply Cases.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: VHS Tape
description:
Limited Item.
Can be retrieved from a TV and inserted back into a different one:

Increases Condemned by +2 Stacks when hit by the The Onryō while carrying the Cursed Tape.
Reduces Condemned by -3 Stacks when inserting the Cursed Tape into a random TV, which spreads The Onryō's message and temporarily turns the TV off.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Trapple
description:
THIS ITEM IS UNUSED
The use of this Item is unknown.

name: Dull Key
description:
A bent and dull Key that once held great power.The Dull Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.
Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Dull Key's power into various effects.
Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 5 seconds.

Activates the Dull Key's Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.
The  Dull Key can be consumed to open the Hatch, if it has not been depleted of its Charges.

name: Skeleton Key
description:
A tarnished and crooked Key, vibrating with ominous power.The Skeleton Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.
Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Skeleton Key's power into various effects.
Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 30 seconds.

Activates the Skeleton Key's  Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.
The  Skeleton Key can be consumed to open the Hatch, if it has not been depleted of its Charges.

name: Map
description:
An old piece of parchment made out of a skin-like material that is rolled and sealed with an uncoloured leather string.
Holding and channelling the Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.

Start the Trial with 1 Generator tracked.
The Map tracks any of the following objects:

Generators within 8 metres.
Generators, Chest, and Totem revealed by Detective's Hunch.
The Map lasts for 20 seconds.

name: Rainbow Map
description:
An piece of parchment made out of oddly fresh skin with blood on its edge that has yet to dry, and that is rolled and sealed with multiple coloured ropes and cords.
Holding and channelling the Rainbow Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.

Start the Trial with 3 random objects tracked.
The Rainbow Map tracks any of the following objects:

Exit Gate Switches, Generators, and the Hatch when you come within 8 metres.
Various Killer Belongings when you come within 8 metres.
Generators, Chests, and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch.
The Rainbow Map lasts for 20 seconds.
"It disheartens me. All this unspeakable knowledge and gruelling effort and yet nothing tangible, nothing usable to get out of this nightmare." — Vigo's Journal

name: Camping Aid Kit
description:
A rudimentary First Aid Kit which can save lives in emergencies, even if it's lacking some of its supplies.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +35 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Camping Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Barely has enough material for a decent patch-up."

name: First Aid Kit
description:
A standard First Aid Kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The First Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

name: Emergency Med-Kit
description:
A sturdy and well organised Med-Kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +45 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Emergency Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"There is a cure for almost everything...but not for this."

name: Ranger Med-Kit
description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed at emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +50 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Ranger Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween Stickers that has been packed with First-Aid equipment.

Makes you considerably more visible.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

name: Anniversary Med-Kit
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Med-Kit that explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!

Increased confetti of +100 %.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Anniversary Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Masquerade Med-Kit
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Med-Kit with a shocking surprise, giving a whole new meaning to the term "Health Scare".

Increased confetti of +100 %.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Masquerade Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! To your health!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Worn-Out Tools
description:
A metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Reduced Good Skill Check Success zone of -10 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Worn-Out Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.
"You call these tools? ... Really?"

name: Toolbox
description:
A metal box containing a set of basic tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +10 %.
The Toolbox has a Capacity of 20 Charges.
"It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

name: Mechanic's Toolbox
description:
A metal box with specialised mechanics tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +75 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -10 %.
The Mechanic's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.

name: Commodious Toolbox
description:
A large metal box containing basic tool and extra mechanical parts.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed by +50 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Commodious Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

name: Engineer's Toolbox
description:
A metal box with highly specialised tools meant for engineering.Most of the tools can be used by neophytes to make quick repairs or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +100 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -25 %.
The Engineer's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.
"I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralysed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." — Vigo's Journal

name: Alex's Toolbox
description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools.Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +10 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +50 %.
Alex's Toolbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

name: Anniversary Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox that is slightly explosive.

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Detonates a firework once depleted.Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Anniversary Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.
"Nothing says happy anniversary like detonating a firework and praying the Killer does not notice.Good luck and thank you for celebrating with us!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Festive Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox packed to the brim with fireworks, it is prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Succeeding a Great Skill Check detonates a small cluster of firecrackers.
Missing a Skill Check detonates fireworks.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Festive Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

name: Masquerade Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox with all of the standard gadgets: wrenches, screwdrivers, fireworks, a hammer...

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Detonates a firework once depleted.Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Masquerade Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! We're fixin' to have a big party!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: EMP
description:
Limited Item.
An electromagnetic pulse device that takes 100 seconds to be printed in Supply Cases.

Has 1 Token and takes 2.5 seconds to charge.
Slows your Movement speed while charging by -10 %.
Removes Temporal Slipstream from yourself and nearby Survivors.
Other Slipstreamed Survivors are highlighted to you in yellow when they are inside the Area of Effect of your charged EMP.
Disables any nearby Biopods for 45 seconds.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

description:

2 Tokens.

Can be found in Supply Cases.

Shoots flames at The Xenomorph whenever it comes within 10 metres of the Turret and is in Line of Sight.
Flames slow The Xenomorph and can knock it out of its Crawler Mode.
The Turret overheats after firing for 4 seconds or after knocking The Xenomorph out of its Crawler Mode.
Overheated Turrets can be repaired by Survivors.
Multiple Turrets firing simultaneously do not stack their damage output.
The Xenomorph can destroy Remote Flame Turrets by attacking them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Vaccine
description:
Limited Item.
A vaccine that helps reverse the effects of a T-Virus infection.

1 Token.
Cures T-Virus Contamination.
Can be found in Supply Cases.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: VHS Tape
description:
Limited Item.
Can be retrieved from a TV and inserted back into a different one:

Increases Condemned by +2 Stacks when hit by the The Onryō while carrying the Cursed Tape.
Reduces Condemned by -3 Stacks when inserting the Cursed Tape into a random TV, which spreads The Onryō's message and temporarily turns the TV off.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Trapple
description:
THIS ITEM IS UNUSED
The use of this Item is unknown.

name: First Aid Kit
description:
A standard First Aid Kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The First Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

name: Emergency Med-Kit
description:
A sturdy and well organised Med-Kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +45 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Emergency Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"There is a cure for almost everything...but not for this."

name: Ranger Med-Kit
description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed at emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.Can be used to heal other Survivors:
Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +50 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Ranger Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween Stickers that has been packed with First-Aid equipment.

Makes you considerably more visible.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

name: Anniversary Med-Kit
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Med-Kit that explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!

Increased confetti of +100 %.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Anniversary Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Masquerade Med-Kit
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A festive Med-Kit with a shocking surprise, giving a whole new meaning to the term "Health Scare".

Increased confetti of +100 %.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:

Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.
The Masquerade Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! To your health!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Worn-Out Tools
description:
A metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Reduced Good Skill Check Success zone of -10 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Worn-Out Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.
"You call these tools? ... Really?"

name: Toolbox
description:
A metal box containing a set of basic tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +10 %.
The Toolbox has a Capacity of 20 Charges.
"It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

name: Mechanic's Toolbox
description:
A metal box with specialised mechanics tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +75 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -10 %.
The Mechanic's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.

name: Commodious Toolbox
description:
A large metal box containing basic tool and extra mechanical parts.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed by +50 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Commodious Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

name: Engineer's Toolbox
description:
A metal box with highly specialised tools meant for engineering.Most of the tools can be used by neophytes to make quick repairs or break various mechanical components.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +100 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -25 %.
The Engineer's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.
"I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralysed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." — Vigo's Journal

name: Alex's Toolbox
description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools.Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
Increased Generator Repair speed of +10 %.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +50 %.
Alex's Toolbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.
"Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

name: Anniversary Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox that is slightly explosive.

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Detonates a firework once depleted.Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Anniversary Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.
"Nothing says happy anniversary like detonating a firework and praying the Killer does not notice.Good luck and thank you for celebrating with us!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: Festive Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox packed to the brim with fireworks, it is prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Succeeding a Great Skill Check detonates a small cluster of firecrackers.
Missing a Skill Check detonates fireworks.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Festive Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

name: Masquerade Toolbox
description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB
A Toolbox with all of the standard gadgets: wrenches, screwdrivers, fireworks, a hammer...

Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
Detonates a firework once depleted.Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
The Masquerade Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! We're fixin' to have a big party!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

name: EMP
description:
Limited Item.
An electromagnetic pulse device that takes 100 seconds to be printed in Supply Cases.

Has 1 Token and takes 2.5 seconds to charge.
Slows your Movement speed while charging by -10 %.
Removes Temporal Slipstream from yourself and nearby Survivors.
Other Slipstreamed Survivors are highlighted to you in yellow when they are inside the Area of Effect of your charged EMP.
Disables any nearby Biopods for 45 seconds.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: First Aid Spray
description:
Limited Item.
A medication that helps reverse the effects of an Uroboros infection.

2 Tokens.
Cures Uroboros Infection.
Can be found in Supply Cases.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Flash Grenade
description:
Craft-able Limited Item.
Craft-able when using Flashbang.Can be used as a distraction or blinding device.

1 Token.
Detonates with a loud bang and flashing lights, temporarily blinding and deafening any nearby Players.
Creates a Loud Noise Notification at its Detonation location.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Keycard
description:
Limited Item.
A keycard exclusive to the Nostromo Wreckage Map.Can be retrieved from the body of a dead cosmonaut, which spawns in a random location on the Map.

Insert the Keycard into a terminal in the left wing of the Nostromo to unlock the Hack Terminal interaction:
Input the keybinds for Left, Down, Up, Right in this order.
Successfully inputting the keybinds opens an airlock door to a secret room containing a Chest.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Lament Configuration
description:
Limited Item.
Spawns in the environment when facing The Cenobite:

Initiates Chain Hunts after an initial idle phase.
Immediately initiates a Chain Hunt if The Cenobite interacts with it.
Reveals its Aura to all Survivors.
Survivors can pick up and carry the Lament Configuration to solve it:

Causes the Oblivious Status Effect while carried.
Reveals the Survivor's location to The Cenobite when starting to solve it, allowing him to teleport near them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Pocket Mirror
description:
Limited Item.
A pocket mirror pulled from the Basement's White Glyph.
Its surface is frosty.

Escaping with the Pocket Mirror awards a bonus of 25,000 Bloodpoints.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.

name: Remote Flame Turret
description:
Limited Item.
A flamethrower turret that can be retrieved from Control Stations and placed down by Survivors.

While carrying the Remote Flame Turret, the following effects apply:
Tracks the presence of The Xenomorph, beeping whenever it is within 41 metres of the Turret.
Grants immunity from being detected by The Xenomorph when it is roaming down in the tunnels.
Inflicts a -35 % Hindered Status Effect, as well as the Exhausted and Incapacitated Status Effects.
Reveals your Aura to all other Survivors.

After deploying the Remote Flame Turret, the following effects apply:
Still tracks the presence of The Xenomorph, beeping whenever it is within 41 metres of the Turret.
Shoots flames at The Xenomorph whenever it comes within 10 metres of the Turret and is in Line of Sight.
Flames slow The Xenomorph and can knock it out of its Crawler Mode.
The Turret overheats after firing for 4 seconds or after knocking The Xenomorph out of its Crawler Mode.
Overheated Turrets can be repaired by Survivors.
Multiple Turrets firing simultaneously do not stack their damage output.
The Xenomorph can destroy Remote Flame Turrets by attacking them.
Limited Items are consumed by The Entity at the Trial's end.
